kpi.name: sgsn_373a
kpi.formula: (iuov.rej_iu_attach_attempts + iuov.rej_iu_detach_attempts + iuov.rej_iu_attach_attempts_ep + iuov.rej_iu_pdp_activation_attempts + iuov.rej_iu_pdp_mod_attempts + iuov.rej_iu_ra_update_attempts + iuov.rej_iu_ra_update_attempts_ep + iuov.rej_iu_mo_sms_attempts + iuov.rej_relocation_attempts_ep + iuov.rej_serv_req_attempts_ep + iuov.rej_relocation_attempts + iuov.rej_serv_req_attempts)

kpi_info.title: Iu overload rejected attempts
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the total number of rejected attempts from Iu interface due to overload.
kpi_info.formula:
sum(REJ_IU_ATTACH_ATTEMPTS + REJ_IU_DETACH_ATTEMPTS +
REJ_IU_ATTACH_ATTEMPTS_EP + REJ_IU_PDP_ACTIVATION_ATTEMPTS +
REJ_IU_PDP_MOD_ATTEMPTS + REJ_IU_RA_UPDATE_ATTEMPTS +
REJ_IU_RA_UPDATE_ATTEMPTS_EP + REJ_IU_MO_SMS_ATTEMPTS +
REJ_RELOCATION_ATTEMPTS_EP + REJ_SERV_REQ_ATTEMPTS_EP +
REJ_RELOCATION_ATTEMPTS + REJ_SERV_REQ_ATTEMPTS)

counters from table(s):p_sgsn_iu_overload
